title: Episode 48: Emily Farris
description: This week on Let’s Eat In Cathy speaks to Casserole Queen Emily Farris. Emily speaks about how she took a Kansas City tradition to Brooklyn and started the Casserole Parties: super-hot get-togethers fueled with free casserole and booze (next one is sponsored by Brooklyn Brewery!). She also speaks on her Casserole Crazy blog and her book “Casserole Crazy: Hot Stuff For your Oven”, and reveals her secret date-meal weapon: Seduction Casserole. This episode was sponsored by 360 Cookware.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
